ing: 3 cups imitation crab or lobster meat
des: "Black olives marry with the seafood fantastically, the unique dressing dazzles, and cheese pleases everyone."
ins: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Add pasta, and cook until al dente, about 8 to 10 minutes. Drain, and place pasta in a large bowl. Stir in crabmeat, celery, and olives. Mix in mayonnaise, Catalina dressing, Worcestershire sauce, hot sauce, and Dijon. Stir in Cheddar cheese, cover, and chill at least 1 hour.
